scripts.prepare:optimism-kovan-dev1: npm run update-abis optimism-kovan-dev1 && npm run update-configs && npm run clean
scripts.prepare:optimism-kovan-dev2: npm run update-abis optimism-kovan-dev2 && npm run update-configs && npm run clean
scripts.prepare:optimism-kovan: npm run update-abis optimism-kovan && npm run update-configs && npm run clean
scripts.prepare:optimism: npm run update-abis optimism && npm run update-configs && npm run clean
scripts.generate-manifest:optimism-kovan-dev1: npm run prepare:optimism-kovan-dev1 && mustache configs/optimismKovanDev1.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.generate-manifest:optimism-kovan-dev2: npm run prepare:optimism-kovan-dev2 && mustache configs/optimismKovanDev2.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.generate-manifest:optimism-kovan: npm run prepare:optimism-kovan && mustache configs/optimismKovan.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.generate-manifest:optimism: npm run prepare:optimism && mustache configs/optimism.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.generate-constants:optimism-kovan-dev1: npm run prepare:optimism-kovan-dev1 && mustache configs/optimismKovanDev1.json src/constants/index.ts.template > src/constants/index.ts
scripts.generate-constants:optimism-kovan-dev2: npm run prepare:optimism-kovan-dev2 && mustache configs/optimismKovanDev2.json src/constants/index.ts.template > src/constants/index.ts
scripts.generate-constants:optimism-kovan: npm run prepare:optimism-kovan && mustache configs/optimismKovan.json src/constants/index.ts.template > src/constants/index.ts
scripts.generate-constants:optimism: npm run prepare:optimism && mustache configs/optimism.json src/constants/index.ts.template > src/constants/index.ts
scripts.codegen:optimism-kovan-dev1: npm run generate-manifest:optimism-kovan-dev1 && npm run generate-constants:optimism-kovan-dev1 && graph codegen
scripts.codegen:optimism-kovan-dev2: npm run generate-manifest:optimism-kovan-dev2 && npm run generate-constants:optimism-kovan-dev2 && graph codegen
scripts.codegen:optimism-kovan: npm run generate-manifest:optimism-kovan && npm run generate-constants:optimism-kovan && graph codegen
scripts.codegen:optimism: npm run generate-manifest:optimism && npm run generate-constants:optimism && graph codegen
scripts.deploy-the-graph:optimism-kovan-dev1: npm run codegen:optimism-kovan-dev1 && graph deploy --product hosted-service perpetual-protocol/perpetual-v2-optimism-kovan-dev1
scripts.deploy-the-graph:optimism-kovan-dev2: npm run codegen:optimism-kovan-dev2 && graph deploy --product hosted-service perpetual-protocol/perpetual-v2-optimism-kovan-dev2
scripts.deploy-the-graph:optimism-kovan: npm run codegen:optimism-kovan && graph deploy --product hosted-service perpetual-protocol/perpetual-v2-optimism-kovan
scripts.deploy-the-graph:optimism: npm run codegen:optimism && graph deploy --product hosted-service perpetual-protocol/perpetual-v2-optimism
scripts.deploy-self-hosted:optimism-kovan-dev1: npm run codegen:optimism-kovan-dev1 && graph deploy -l ${npm_package_version} --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 perpetual-protocol/perpetual-v2-optimism-kovan-dev1
scripts.deploy-self-hosted:optimism-kovan-dev2: npm run codegen:optimism-kovan-dev2 && graph deploy -l ${npm_package_version} --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 perpetual-protocol/perpetual-v2-optimism-kovan-dev2
scripts.deploy-self-hosted:optimism-kovan: npm run codegen:optimism-kovan && graph deploy -l ${npm_package_version} --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 perpetual-protocol/perpetual-v2-optimism-kovan
scripts.deploy-self-hosted:optimism: npm run codegen:optimism && graph deploy -l ${npm_package_version} --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 perpetual-protocol/perpetual-v2-optimism
